title: Sports facilities at PES EC campus
content: how are the sports facilities at EC campus , is there a football ground or a football team in EC campus ??

comments.body: Yup a ground for football and a team. The team is pretty good as well.

Free to access facilities:-Football ground, Volleyball,Cricket Ground, Basketball Court,  2 badminton courts in the quadrangle, 1 PE room that has a gymming machine, 2 TT tables,Carrom Chess anol..

Paid ones(MRD Student Centre)(All indoor): Basketball Court, Full fledged gym. There'll be many other sports facilities like Badminton courts,Kabaddi,etc. in the floors above but as of now this is all I know.

Team selection trials are there for every sports.

Hey how are clubs at EC compared to RR?
Are there any standout clubs like E-Cell?

Actually we freshers had a club orientation a week ago. Here's the pdf of it.

[Club Orientation ](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1y7LzRfgQISMMagIyrtGcmX2OnenmsGKj/view?usp=drivesdk)

Turns out the Entrepreneurship club is pretty active in here. Today they conducted a 12hr workshop cum hackathon on stocks. The event was named as "The Wolf of Wall Street". Many students from both the campuses participated in it
